questions.question: Do you often forget tasks, appointments, or special dates?
Do you often feel overwhelmed or burnt out by your workload?
Do you set goals but struggle to follow through on them?
Do you struggle to concentrate on one task at a time?
Do you have a structured plan for your daily or weekly schedule?
Have you organised your notification settings on your devices?
Would earning points, tracking streaks, or hitting milestones motivate you to stay on track?
Do you often prioritise your mental or physical wellbeing (sleep, exercise and wellness)?
Do you take regular break whilst working?
Would having more balance, structure, and motivation transform your daily life?
which do you use the most?
